alert.note: Alert for Jackson; Washington (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 16 at 8:00PM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of western Jackson and northeastern Washington Counties through 730 PM CDT... At 700 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 8 miles southeast of Graceville, moving southwest at 20 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Chipley, Marianna, Graceville, Bradford, Cottondale, Alford, Wausau, Campbellton, Richter Crossroads, Jacob City, Chipley Municipal Airport, Orange Hill, Kynesville, Ridgetop, Steele City, Gilberts Mill, Round Lake, Cottondale Airport, Jacobs and Bahoma. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
